Posts.Content: My Mom has been a herceptin patient for 2 years, has nonsurgical stage 4 breast cancer.  Doing great, has some of the side effects but her heart is very healthy.  Anyone experience personality changes or mood swings? Wondering if from IV treatments or from lasting effects of radiation...had metastic tumors on her brain that are have been gone for a quite awhile.  Most of the time seems like her old self but can have sudden changes in attitude and forgetfullness does this sound familiar to anyone?
Posts.Title: mood changes
